High animation quality and perfect translation of subs.  Includes cultural context subtitles in addition to translations so that you can understand all the Japanese jokes from a proper perspective.  A shame they never finished.
Their quality was consistant, and they made a marverlous job with the translation.
Good subs, despite a bunch of redundant TL notes.
Nice subbing and good quality video.
They include many useful notes that help explain the parodies.
Subs are nicely done, it doesn't hurt to read them.

great explanation of puns and such,
well timed karaoke for the OP and ED
additional text in opening scenes is translated which not every sub group does

Probably the best sub there ever will be of school rumble, from one of the best fansub groups. Very accurate translations which sounds pretty good in english as well. Cultural references, and many more.
Simply EPIC sub!
the subs are bit excessive when it comes to not translating things, like bento, but they also do a great job at explaining visual gags, and the subs have a way better flow than the e-d ones

decent sub job, but do you guys take yourselves too seriously?
TL was great. Detailed show notes. great encoding
They did a very good job on the subs and i liked the anime also.

Fantastic job, although some words were changed... everything else was quality.
gives additional information and gives explanations of certain keywords
Awsome Quality   Trans with alot of notices =D
